metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9847 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The bdecode function in bdecode.cpp in libtorrent 1.1.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtorrent-rasterbar9 - 1.1.5-1build1
python3-libtorrent - 1.1.5-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtorrent-rasterbar package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.5-1build1').
